Czy opłaca się grać w Portala 2 w 2022?, cholera wracaj do pierwszej części, bo nawet ona się nie zestarzał. Sequel ma sporo technologicznych szczegółów które nadal zachwycają. Wszystko co Portal  robił świetnie, Portal 2 podnosi na następny poziom. Znikomy Świat przedstawiony został po prostu majestatycznie rozszerzony, fabuła wciąga, wszystkie żarty siadają, zakończenia nie można sobie wyobrazić lepszego, a o tym jak genialna jest finałowa walka nawet nie wspomnę. 10/10

Não é à toa que Portal é um dos nomes mais reconhecidos e respeitados dos jogos, uma baita campanha, e acompanhado com a minha melhor experiência multiplayer cooperativa, extremamente divertido e engraçado, eu realmente desejo muito por uma sequência com tanta qualidade quanto os jogos anteriores. A dificuldade é balanceada, muitas vezes eu passava os puzzles em minutos, outras vezes me via preso neles por horas. Porém, após descansar e abrir o jogo de novo, eu conseguia resolver esses puzzles que ficava preso em alguns minutos também. No geral, recomendo muito, principalmente no período de promoção, onde o jogo fica por volta de 6 reais, e peça pra um amigo comprar também, vale muito à pena.

Portal  это не просто игра, это целая вселенная. Пока я проходил эту замечательную игру я понял несколько вещей, что не всегда хорошо верить людям с которыми вы только что познакомились. В первой части мы пытались  убить GLaDOS а в второй мы вместе с ней пытаемся выжить и вернуть все на место. Я когда первый раз проходил первую и вторую часть Portal я наслаждался игрой и интересным для меня сюжетом. Portal игра в которой ты не ждешь резкого поворота сюжета, как это произошло с Уитли. Эта игра оставила у меня место в сердце и я ее не когда не забуду.

Portal 2 to gra platformowa łamigłówkowa a ja spóźniłem się mocno z tą recenzją. W gierce robimy po 2 portale i w ten sposób przechodzimy kolejne poziomy a do tego mamy krótką i prostą ale fabułę; co ja uwielbiam i doceniam. Mechanika sprawna, poziomy średnio trudne; gra nie nudzi, grafika git, muzyka nie pamiętam :/ Jeśli przejdziemy single i dalej chcemy grać to można se pograć z ziomkiem. Fajna gra na pobudzenie mózgu co mi się przydało. Polecam!

It made me attracted to talking eye. Wheatley is so seductive, funny, cute, but can be dominant and dangerous as well... Perfect hubby material.

But seriously, I still remember playing this game for the first time and how captivated I was by the characters and plot twists. I love how it expands on the first game and lets you explore the huge, nonsensical facility more in depth. It's an over the top setting and the game presents it just so well. It somewhat feels more alive than the first game, gives off more positive vibes with all the jokes and stuff. That doesn't make the first game worse in any way of course, it just had a very different vibe, more horror-like. I also adore the voice acting in both games.
The puzzles are fun and satisfying, utilizing one of the best game mechanics ever made. There's a lot of new features and obstacles that didn't appear in the first game, so the gameplay is different, and sometimes even more challenging in my opinion.

The multiplayer has its own little story and is very well designed, giving you even more options to play with the portals in a new and unique way. You can hardly find a multiplayer puzzle experience similar to this.

I personally enjoyed it even more than the first game, because the story was on point and the multiplayer was very enjoyable. Both are a gem though.

Good game.

The original Portal had the element of surprise. Its style of first-person physics-based puzzle gameplay was unique. GLaDOS, the murderous robotic villain, was new and vibrant and evil in the most charming way. Cake jokes and songs about surviving dismemberment were still hilarious. It was short, succinct and essential. Creating a sequel without playing all the same notes and making it feel like Portal: The Longer Version is a tough task. For Valve, it's apparently no problem.
From the first moments of waking up in the rusting Aperture Science facility to right before the credits roll, Portal 2 rarely falters. The world is bigger, the story thicker, and the character development more surprising. The mania of GLaDOS, the facility's operator, is molded into unexpected forms alongside a host of brutally funny personalities. The history of the Aperture Science facility is filled in, character origins discussed, and though its pacing suffers as it occasionally strikes a more serious tone, an abundance of cruel jokes and cheerfully sincere death threats prevent it from losing its sarcastic charm. When you're not staring at your screen with wrinkled, pained expression on your face trying to figure out a puzzle, expect to be laughing.

One of the best games I've ever played. The story of Portal and Portal 2 was so attention grabbing and personal attachments were made to different characters within the series. Personally, Wheatley had a connection to me when he was on the good side since he felt like a genuine person trying to help and not just some programmed AI giving you instructions in a boring manner. 10/10 would love to play again.

满分作品，每个关卡的创意性和可玩性都是顶尖的，世界观非常完美，解谜中等难度，不需要看攻略，每个墙壁多试试，多琢磨琢磨就找到出路了，这才是这游戏的游玩意义，克服每一个关卡的难关所带来的成就感可不是看攻略所通关可以相提并论的。顺带一提，G姐真是小毒舌傲娇呀爱了，哈哈。

A bona fide classic puzzle game that's engaging but never gets super difficult. The dialog and humor has a universal charm similar to a Pixar movie that evens out the serious puzzles to make the experience much more light hearted. Similar to Half Life 2, the environments feel fully realized and lived-in and even sometimes inspire awe with their scale.
